sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十，小餘六十二；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder ten, small remainder sixty two;
Large remainder twenty two, small remainder sixteen;

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘四，小餘四百一十；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder four, small remainder four hundred ten;

sentences.chinese: 大餘二十七，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder twenty seven, small remainder twenty four;
Duameng Da Huang Luo Gan Lu first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二十八，小餘三百一十七；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty eight, small remainder three hundred seventeen;
Large remainder thirty three, no small remainder;
You Zhao Dun Zhi second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘二十二，小餘六百六十五；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twenty two, small remainder six hundred sixty five;
Large remainder thirty eight, small remainder eight;
Qiang Wu Xie Qiao third year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘十七，小餘七十三；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder seventeen, small remainder seventy three;
Large remainder forty three, small remainder sixteen;
Tu Wei Dun Tan fourth year.
